mapper.select: SELECT b.*, u.*, uf.* FROM users u LEFT OUTER JOIN boast b USING(u_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN users_file uf USING(u_no) ORDER BY boast_last DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOAST ( u_no, boast_sj, boast_cn, boast_co, boast_ip, boast_at, boast_img, boast_frst, boast_last ) VALUES ( #{uNo}, #{boastSj}, #{boastCn}, 0, 'TEST_IP', 'N', #{boastImg}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOAST WHERE u_no = #{UsersVO.uNo} AND BOAST_ID = #{boastId}
